name: Judy and Punch and many more
description: Women have been oppressed by patriarchal conventions and by men under the guise of the supernatural throughout history, but recent moving-image works are reframing these historical persecutions.

key_work.credit_line:

key_work.material_description: new and repurposed materials, cotton, linen, plastic, polyster, suede, rubber
key_work.brief_description: Judy and Punch scrounge a living doing puppet shows. To help them stand out from the audience, costume designer Edie Kurzer draped Punch (Damon Herriman) in a bold red costume that contrasted spectacularly with the theatre set where the performances were staged.

links.description: Whereas The Crucible uses witch trials as an analogy for McCarthyism, Good Omens uses it to explore the excesses of religious fanaticism.

start.title: The Dressmaker
start.brief_description: In 1950s Australia, beautiful, talented dressmaker Tilly returns to her tiny hometown to right wrongs from her past. As she tries to reconcile with her mother, she starts to fall in love while transforming the fashion of the town.

constellations_other.name: Atari’s Basketball
constellations_other.description: Released in 1979, just in time for the arcade heydays of the early 1980s, Atari’s Basketball was the first basketball game to use a trackball as the input mechanic and a 45-degree angled side view. This set the standard for basketball games that followed.

constellations_other.description: Emma Fryer's costume design for The Great took inspiration from both accurate finery of the period, and contemporary designs of fashion houses like Dior. The resulting costumes evolve with the characters.

links.description: In both of these tales, a woman avenges the wrongs done against her family. In The Dressmaker, these are recent injustices, in Good Omens Anathema Device uses her ancestor Agnes Nutter’s Nice and Accurate Prophecies to save the world.
